languages.text: "Человек-без-сердца не только врачевал. Еще он калечил. Пытал. Медленно убивал. И наблюдал".

traits.locale_text: "Я осознаю, что свершила непростительное. И готова принять любое наказание".

languages.text: "The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."
languages.original_text: "Человек-без-сердца не только врачевал. Еще он калечил. Пытал. Медленно убивал. И наблюдал".

traits.locale_text: "The Heartless One did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. He tortured them. He killed them slowly. And he observed it."
"The Heartless One did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. He tortured them. He killed them slowly. And he observed it."
"The Heartless One did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."
"The Heartless One did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."
"The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."
"The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."

languages.text: « Le Sans-Cœur ne s'est pas contenté de soigner les gens. Il les a aussi mutilés. Torturés. Tués à petit feu. Et observés. »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."

traits.locale_text: « Le Sans-Cœur ne s'est pas contenté de soigner les gens. Il les a aussi mutilés. Torturés. Tués à petit feu. Et observés. »

languages.text: «El Despiadado no solo curaba a la gente. También la mutilaba. La torturaba. La mataba lentamente. Y observaba».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."

traits.locale_text: «El despiadado no solo curaba a la gente. También la mutilaba. La torturaba. La mataba lentamente. Y observaba».

languages.text: 「無情なる男がしていたことは、民を治すだけじゃない。彼は人々の体を傷つけ、痛めつけ、ゆっくりと殺していた。そしてその様子を観察していたのよ」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."

traits.locale_text: 「無情なる者がしていたことは、民を治すだけじゃない。彼は人々の体を傷つけ、痛めつけ、ゆっくりと殺していた。そしてその様子を観察していたのよ」

languages.text: “无心者不仅仅治愈人们，他也同样残害他们，折磨他们，慢慢杀死他们，观察整个过程。”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."

traits.locale_text: “无心者不仅仅治愈人们，他也同样残害他们，折磨他们，慢慢杀死他们，观察整个过程。”

languages.text: "Der herzlose Mann heilte nicht nur. Er verstümmelte auch. Folterte. Tötete langsam. Und beobachtete."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."

traits.locale_text: "Der Herzlose heilte nicht nur. Er verstümmelte auch. Folterte. Tötete langsam. Und beobachtete."

languages.text: "Kalpsiz Adam, insanları iyileştirmekten fazlasını yaptı. Onları sakat da bıraktı. İşkence yapıp yavaşça öldürdü ve tüm bunları gözlemledi."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man did more than heal people. He maimed them, too. Tortured them. Killed them slowly. And observed."
